localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.
nodes.title: PC Builder - Custom PC part picker tool to build your PC
nodes.author: Sunny Bundel

nodes.excerpt: gSweets slash commands save you time, and keep you in a state of flow. Our first batch of shortcuts let you format text, add screenshots, and search emojis, GIFs, and stock photos. Add it to Chrome for free today. Designed to be 100% private.
nodes.title: gSweets - Save time in Google Docs with Notion-like shortcuts
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: Letterloop lets you create private group newsletters with friends and family. Stay in touch, grow closer together, and discover things you never knew with the most important people in your life â€” all over email. â € Get started at letterloop.co
nodes.title: Letterloop - Create group newsletters with friends and family. âœï¸

nodes.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
nodes.title: Fastdok - Generate documents that work in a few minutes
nodes.author: Ayoub Moustaid

nodes.excerpt: Find your 404 page design inspiration! We've collected some of the best 404 page designs from around the web.
nodes.title: 404 Page Inspiration - The best 404 pages from around the web.
nodes.author: Jaisal Rathee

nodes.excerpt: 1 pass. 7 continents. 23 brands. Thousands of trips from luxury journeys to group tours to private adventures. One price. Zero risk. Lock in your travel dreams today with full peace of mind and flexibility. Cancel any time. Redeem by 2023. Save $600.
nodes.title: FlexiPass by Travelstride - Fully flexible travel credits for trips to every continent.
nodes.author: Gavin Delany

nodes.excerpt: Ethi helps you find out how Facebook tracks you across the internet, across the world, collects hundreds of interests about you and tracks your social life. Then we help you delete what you no longer want them to keep!
nodes.title: Ethi - Find out what Facebook knows about you, and delete it.
nodes.author: Michael Jelly

nodes.excerpt: Calculate a websiteâ€™s environmental impact, see the breakdown and learn what measures can be taken to improve it.
nodes.title: Beacon - Calculate a webpages footprint what you can do to about it.
nodes.author: Chris Butterworth

nodes.excerpt: Gumdrop is a matchmaking community that values more than just looks. Go beyond text & pictures and discover people you vibe with on more than just a surface level. Come join the invite-only matchmaking movement. After all, it's who you are that counts.
nodes.title: Gumdrop - Find your happy match.
nodes.author: Gilbert

nodes.excerpt: Tunnels is a text-based "Choose-your-own-ending" game set in a world post-apocalypse. --- It contains: - 21 hand-drawn illustrations - 9 main story endings - 3 unlockable side stories, each with 3 different endings --- Collect them all!
nodes.title: Tunnels - An apocalyptic choose-your-own-ending game
nodes.author: Bryan Ho

nodes.excerpt: Finally, a flashcard app that just worksâ€”for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
nodes.title: Fresh Cards - Flashcards that just work
nodes.author: Allen Ussher

nodes.excerpt: We have you covered as you jingle all the way from your bed to the living room. Dress up your festivities with animated, illustrated, or traditional Christmas video backgrounds by Icons8.
nodes.title: Christmas Zoom Backgrounds - Delightful animations and virtual backgrounds for gatherings
nodes.author: Ivan

nodes.excerpt: Momento provide a powerful tool to help you manage your domains and SSL certificates to prevent you from forgetting. With Momento you can renew your domains, manage your DNS and buy new domains from all your registrars. Everything in one place.
nodes.title: Momento - A powerful platform to help you manage your domains
nodes.author: Luca Rossi

nodes.excerpt: Bring this unprecedented piece of engineering achievement home as the centerpiece of your life and home. â € Now featuring 50% more dance party than 20 second dance party.

nodes.title: 5 Years of Design - Time travel through handpicked, beautiful designs.
nodes.author: Drikerf

nodes.excerpt: A community of once rejected YC founders to share experiences, discuss less tedious ways to get funding, and alternate options to grow their business. Join to connect and learn with a group of motivated founders!
nodes.title: rally - A community of rejected YC founders
nodes.author: Troy Osinoff

nodes.excerpt: 12 illustrative Christmas icons in 3D. Available in large PNGs or source files in PSD and C4D. Free to be used for commercial or personal purposes. All we ask is to attribute Iconfinder.
nodes.title: Free Christmas icons in 3D - Make your holiday designs pop with 3D Christmas icons
nodes.author: Martin LeBlanc

nodes.excerpt: Fuel fund showcases selected startups to 1000s of handpicked investors in the US. Think of it as a fund's demo day but asynchronous and massively scalable. When a startup lists on wantfuel.com, we forward their details to almost 5000+ investors on our rolodex.
nodes.title: Fuel Fund - List your startup and get discovered by 1000s of investors
nodes.author: Sid

nodes.excerpt: Need landing page in Webflow, web-platform in Bubble, mobile app in Adalo or an automation in Zapier? Don't spend time on learning NoCode platforms. With WeLoveNoCode you can send unlimited NoCode projects to a team of Nocode developers for a monthly fee
nodes.title: WeLoveNoCode - NoCode development for a monthly fee
nodes.author: Nikolai Lebedovsky

nodes.excerpt: Flex Widgets is the first real widget editor for iPhone and iPad. It allows you to build widgets freely by placing elements on them and then editing, moving, resizing and layering those elements. All in a super intuitive editor.
nodes.title: Flex Widgets - A widget editor for iPhone and iPad
nodes.author: Yannik Schrade

nodes.excerpt: MyWebAR is the easiest way to build cross-platform augmented reality instantly available in a browser. Whether you are a professional developer or have no prior experience, we have the set of tools that will allow you to get started in the matter of minutes.
nodes.title: MyWebAR 2.0 - The easiest way to create webAR
nodes.author: Anna Belova

nodes.excerpt: Sometimes words just aren't enough... on Monet, send a drawing to make a new connection. :~)
nodes.title: Monet - Draw your way to love, to friends, and to a good time.
nodes.author: Jonathan Xue

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Accountable 2.0 - the all new way to become HIPAA compliant. Designed to simplify the entire process of achieving and managing HIPAA compliance, from HIPAA training to policy management. And did we mention $100k HIPAA breach guarantee?
nodes.title: Accountable 2.0 - HIPAA compliance management platform and $100k guarantee
nodes.author: Kevin Henry

nodes.excerpt: PrivacyGrader.com provides an online assessment within 24 hours that measures how well a businessâ€™s website upholds consumer data protection laws, assesses privacy functionality, and highlights potential gaps and issues with the site.
nodes.title: PrivacyGrader - Analyzing a website's privacy & compliance in under 24 hours
nodes.author: Alexandra Velasquez

nodes.excerpt: 'Save the World' is a game for 3 or more people where players compete, collaborate and everything in between to save the world. The goal of the game is for everyone to agree on a solution to a randomly chosen disaster, like an asteroid strike.
nodes.title: Save The World - The card game for humanity
nodes.author: Neeraj Thakur
